official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to extend to commissioned officers of the service the benefits and immunities of the Soldiers' and Sailors' Civil Relief Act of 1940, as amended.

summary.text: Revises the Public Health Service Act to extend to commissioned officers of the Public Health Service the benefits and immunities of the Soldiers' and Sailors' Civil Relief Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to extend to commissioned officers of the service the benefits and immunities of the Soldiers' and Sailors' Civil Relief Act of 1940, as amended.
